name: Super Lean Trapadise
description:
Jump and run through Netrocity, collect items and solve physic puzzles!

Based on classic jump& run games, you run and jump through different levels and collect items. Solve physic based puzzles and explore different environments. Discover realworld graffiti pieces from various artists. Try to get through all Levels and handle the disorientation!

*Videos and streams of ingame content are appreciated, drop a link to your video if you do so.

*It´s free, let me hear what you think about it! If u played it, you can send me your critique and thoughts about it here: cornergamesconnect@gmail.com
